required.name: Please enter your name.
required.career: Please enter your years of experience.

invalid.name: Name must be 1 to 10 characters long and contain only Korean or English letters.
invalid.nickname: Nickname must be 1 to 10 characters long and contain only Korean or English letters.
invalid.password: Password must be at least 8 characters and include letters, numbers, and special characters.
invalid.career: Experience must be a number greater than or equal to 0. (e.g., 8)
invalid.intro: Introduction must be at least 8 characters long.
invalid.description: Description must be at least 10 characters long.
